description: Client-side frameworks dominate the conversation about the future of web apps. Where does that leave us Ruby developers? Let's explore a way to build realtime apps driven by a traditional backend, without writing a single line of JavaScript! You’ll walk away with a new way to build modern, realtime apps employing client-side patterns.
title: RailsConf 2016 -  Build Realtime Apps with Ruby & Pakyow By Bryan Powell
